snippet: Philadelphia earned an 8-4 victory over Pittsburgh in a fight-filled game. The Flyers lead the series, three games to none.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Flyers defeat Pittsburgh Penguins, 8-4, to lead Eastern Conference semifinals, 3-0; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia earned an 8-4 victory over Pittsburgh in a fight-filled game. The Flyers lead the series, three games to none.

headline.seo: Flyers Rout Penguins to Take 3-0 Lead in Series
headline.main: Going Gets Rough; Flyers Take Charge
headline.print_headline: Going Gets Rough; Flyers Take Charge
